skills.name: __UNMATCHED__
skills.description: Fallback cuando no existe regla explicita.

skills.description: Valida bindings y variables de entorno basicas.

skills.name: check_d1_schema
skills.description: Verifica columnas minimas en skill_events y skill_runs.

skills.name: check_router_consistency
skills.description: Valida estructura de RouteDecision y presencia de fallback.

skills.description: Verifica resolucion DNS y conectividad basica con CGR_BASE_URL.

skills.name: d1_remote_schema_verify
skills.description: Valida que el esquema D1 esperado exista y sea consistente.

skills.name: mistral_timeout_triage
skills.description: Diagnostica timeouts del gateway AI y recomienda backoff.
